body.name: Mimoglad Office Chair, High Back Ergonomic Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support and Headrest, Swivel Task Chair with flip-up Armrests for Guitar Playing, 5 Years Warranty
features: [5 YEARS HASSLE REPAIR] One ergonomic chair and 5 years of assistant service are provided by Mimoglad. Every issue can be resolved without excuse.

[Encourage “S-Shaped” Spinal Posture] An ergonomic chair with proper support always maintain a healthy spine posture and will not have a damaging and flattening effect on your back. Good lumbar support will minimize strain or pain on the lumbar discs in your spine. The adjustable headrest prevents you from hunching forward, scrunching your shoulders. Don't be slouching, this is the culprit.

[No Degradation of The Comfort Of The Butt] Choose sufficient padding and breathable material. Low-Quality foam can break down quickly (Not because you are a big man). So Mimoglad increased the quality & density of the foam to balance softness, durability, and support, thereby reducing pressure on your hips and tailbone. mesh fabric has a noticeable ability to wick moisture and it is highly breathable, You will not get bogged down with sweat.

[Get The Best Possible Fit and Feel] If you will be spending a lot of time in it, an adjustable computer chair is your best bet. Mimoglad chair allows lifting the headrest to land perfectly where your head is. Look for a pneumatic adjustment lever to let you bring the seat higher up or lower. the adjustable lumbar support to provide lumbar protection and eliminating lower back body strains. Reclining&rocking can help relieve pressure on your spinal discs.

[Sustainable Above First Impressions] The chair passed a commercial test so you can not worry about work and about the reliability of all elements. The frame of the high back office chair is made of strong nylon, which is most suitable for chair production. With the entire base made from high-strength metal, the strength and durability of this chair support will easily hold up to 300 lbs and for many years of extended use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very comfortable, great for price
reviews.reviewText: This chair is great for the price. The cushion on the chair is pretty thick so it makes the chair really comfortable to sit on for long periods of time. If you’re someone who likes to sit up with you’re legs in the chair this is a good choice because of the cushion size, for reference i’m 5’8. The material is good quality, I actually spilled some matcha on the armrest cloth piece and it came off nicely, the material is easy to clean. It comes with a cover to go on the seat cushion that is really cute and soft (make sure you put the cover on before you assemble the chair because you can’t once it’s put together). I personally took the head test off in the picture because I like to see more of my desk but there’s nothing wrong with it, It’s just a personal choice. Also the headrest is adjustable. One thing that could be better is the cushions on the arm rests they’re a little thin so the arm wrests are a kind of hard hard. Overall this was a great purchase, I’d recommend this chair.(assembly took about 30 minutes and the directions were very clear and concise)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best support and very comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with my office chair! It was easy to assemble, durable, supportive and comfortable, and looks nice in my office!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, but not for the way I sit
reviews.reviewText: I've been sitting in this chair 12 hours a day for a month now, and I finally feel like I can write an honest review about it.The chair was packaged very well, and was one of the easiest chair constructions I've experienced over the years. The tools were great quality and I was able to construct it alone with no issues.Visually, the chair looks nice. The colors pop, and it doesn't have a "cheap" look to it, despite its plastic and mesh design.When first sitting in the chair, it's comfortable. The seat cushion is slightly firm, but soft enough where I don't feel too much fatigue using it, especially during those long sitting sessions. The mesh seat back is nice, and I don't feel the pressure of the back's frame on my shoulder blades. The headrest is a nice touch, as it has a slight give to it, making it comfortable to lean into.After a few weeks, however, I'm noticing I've had some lower back strain/problems which I didn't have in my previous chair. So I'm not very comfortable anymore. It's also affecting my sleeping positions, making it difficult to get comfortable and fall asleep quickly.A majority of my sitting time is spent cross-legged with my back pressed firmly against the backrest to keep my spine aligned, and doing so on this chair, I think, is partly causing the problem. Because of the discomfort, I'm constantly changing my sitting position between "proper", leaned back, cross-legged, and leaned forward. With my old chair, I could sit cross-legged the entire time with my back pressed against the backrest the entire workday and not have any issues.There's an adjustable lower backrest, but it has some issues. For one, it doesn't stay in the position you keep it in, and you'll need to readjust it if you squirm around in the chair or get up and leave for a while (it will fall back into its lowest position on its own). Even keeping the back rest adjusted, I still can't find a comfortable position for long sitting sessions.Also, there are plastic covers for the joint screws on the swivel arms. These pop out constantly, falling to the ground. There's nothing to lock them into place aside from light tension. I've hammered them on with my hands, but it only lasts for a day or so before falling off again. I've resorted to taping them on.For its price, it may not be a terrible purchase, especially if you're not planning on sitting for actual office-length work day in and day out. However, I'll likely be looking for another chair. In the meantime, I'm trying to switch to an orthopedic seat pillow and added armrest cushions to increase the longevity of it, but I don't like that I have to resort to these measures on a chair 1 month old. We'll see if the cushions help the lower back pain.Overall, it's not a terrible chair. You can do much worse, especially for the price. But for anyone looking for something comfortable for long sitting hours, I don't believe this will be your chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, solid and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This chair looks good and easy to assemble. It feels very comfortable sitting on it. It nicely supports the back and waist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ergonomic chair at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I received the chair last week, it was packaged very well and all pieces were included. I was able to follow the instructions for assembly and my only recommendation is to make sure you add the included cushion cover BEFORE you assemble to chair. This step is not included in the instruction booklet and I found it impossible to add after assembly (and had to backtrack and disassemble the chair to add the cushion cover and reassemble 😅). Overall so far I’m really excited to use this chair, it looks modern with clean lines and feels comfortable. I’m not sure I understand why the bottom of the headrest touches my upper shoulders and only time will tell if this will be tolerable to me or not. I don’t expect to use the headrest so much so if not, it’s possible to take it off. I like the wheel, the adjustable lumbar and that I can push the armrests up, which allows for the chair to fit under my small desk. So far, it’s a thumbs up for this ergonomic chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy chair and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This chair came quickly and I’m so glad because I’m able to get my office started. Everything was packed in a box so nicely and it was a little funny but a great detail that it came with white gloves for assembly. Literal white glove service. The chair was easy to set up, took me no more than an hour - probably would’ve been shorter time if I wasn’t watching TV at the same time. The cushion is comfortable, the headrest is comfortable, and it feels so nice to not have to sit in a dining chair while I work. The parts were in great condition, the only thing was there was already a little knick in the swivel part of the arm rest but it’s really not noticeable. Now my husband is thinking of purchasing a chair! Wish there was a black color for him

I recently purchased this chair in white and I'm eager to share my thoughts on it. Right out of the box, the chair's aesthetic appeal is undeniable. Its sleek white color adds a modern touch to my workspace, fitting seamlessly with my home office decor.As for assembly, it was straightforward with clear instructions. I was able to put it together in a relatively short amount of time without any major hiccups, which was a relief.The chair's comfort level is where it truly shines. The ergonomic design supports my back and posture throughout long working hours. The adjustable features allow me to customize the fit to my liking, ensuring I'm comfortable and well-supported at all times. The seat cushion is particularly noteworthy for its plushness, making extended periods of sitting much more bearable.Durability-wise, the chair feels sturdy and well-constructed. The materials used appear to be high quality, and the chair maintains its stability and comfort even after consistent use. This aspect is crucial for me, as I wanted a chair that could withstand daily use without showing immediate signs of wear.In terms of value, I believe the chair offers a great balance between quality and price. It's an investment in my comfort and health during work, and so far, it seems like a wise choice.If I had to point out any drawbacks, it would be the limited color options. While the white is beautiful, having more choices could cater to a wider range of personal preferences and office decors.Overall, my experience has been overwhelmingly positive. It checks all the boxes for comfort, support, style, and durability. For anyone in the market for a new office chair, I highly recommend considering this one.

The media could not be loaded. El material además de bonito se ve muy resistente. Está fácil de armar aunque un poco pesadas algunas piezas. Trae unos guantes para que no la ensucies.El asiento es mucho más amplio que la silla que tenía, se siente acolchado y cómodo. Lo único que le agregaría sería el tornillo que otras traen para hacer hacia adelante la parte la zona lumbar.Creo que es buena compra. Veremos cuánto dura.

reviews.reviewerName: Beautiful plants and good quality clings. Relocated it a couple of times and it’s still very clingy.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time to buy a computer chair online. Being Asian, I was afraid the backrest and headrest may not be at right positions for my build. Thank goodness everything is better than expected. The color is beautiful, cheering up my room. Its seat is really comfortable and the backrest supports my back. I am thankful to all the useful reviews. Good value for money !

reviews.reviewTitle: Look at brands. Pictures are quite decieving.
reviews.reviewText: Unable to attach the seat to the chair due to incorrect screw sizes The packaging was also poorly done, box was half cut open and the parts were not packaged properly. For any that is buying this product I recommend looking at other alternatives.
Una silla cómoda y estética. El asiento es firme, pero no por ello incomodo. Su armado es relativamente rápido si se siguen las instrucciones. La recomiendo.
